title: Lapis Development Sample
description:
Blue dominates.  Plain weave or Twill variation.
Similar to Pomegranate. Lighter than others.  Med. blue, teal & oive warp. Med green, teal & metallic blue-green weft.
Stapled to 8.5 x 11\" card. \'H-8B LAPIS HAND WOVEN\" written on card. (lt. greens, blue, metallic blue-green)
